participant_1.background:
I practice yoga and meditation to keep fit and calm my mind.
i am the youngest in my family.
i prefer winter.
i make ask a year.
i m currently unemployed so i have time to write.

participant_2.background:
I hold my loved ones closest to my heart because they are the ones who matter most.
my favorite food is meatloaf.
i am gong to adopt a dog very soon.
I'll keep painting portraits of my dogs as a way to express myself without revealing my secret passion to my conservative family.
i am allergic to shellfish.

content.text: Hello, how are you?
Hey there! I am doing well, thanks. How about yourself?
Doing great! I just got done with a yoga session and I am feeling refreshed.
That is awesome! I love yoga, it is so calming. I try to do it as often as I can.
Me too. It helps me to clear my head and focus.
That's great! What is your favorite type of yoga?
I like Vinyasa yoga because it is a mix of different types of yoga. It is very challenging and I always feel like I get a great workout.
That sounds great! I have never tried Vinyasa yoga, but I may have to give it a try.
You should! I think you would really like it.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
So, what do you do for a living?
I am currently unemployed, but I am a writer. I am hoping to get a job soon so I can continue writing.
That's great! I love to read. What kind of writing do you do?
I write short stories and poems. I also like to write essays and articles.
That's awesome! I love short stories and poems. I think they are so creative.
Thank you! I am glad you like them.
So, what are you working on right now?
I am working on a short story about a woman who is trying to find her way in the world.
That sounds really interesting! I would love to read it when you are finished.
Sure, I will let you know.
Thanks!
No problem
